name: .RUMBA
summary: Learn about .RUMBA files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

instructions: Because RUMBA files have been encrypted by ransomware, you cannot open them as you would normally. However, you can attempt to decrypt your RUMBA files using Emsisoft Decryptor for STOP Djvu. Read the instructions at the program's website carefully before attempting to decrypt your RUMBA files.
